description: According to what others have told you, or to your own awareness, how often, if ever, do you gasp, choke, or make snorting sounds during sleep?
domain: 1=never or rarely - only once or a few times ever, 2=sometimes - a few nights per month; under sspecial circumstances, 3=at least once a week, but pattern may be irregular, 4=several (3 to 7) nights per week, 9= do not know
